original_title: Internationaal Theater Amsterdam: Een Klein Leven
overview: No novel has captivated and moved millions of readers during the past few years like A Little Life by American author Hanya Yanagihara. Ivo van Hove adapted Yanagiharaâ€™s novel to theater and created a penetrating performance. Ramsey Nasr won the Louis d'Or (best male performance) for his portrayal of Jude.
title: A Little Life
